[CHUNK_14] Regarding this bill, the Department of Budget and Finance stated it is difficult to determine whether the special fund would be financially self-sustaining. [CHUNK_16]",
  "updates_from_previous_fiscal_note": "New testimony provides a significantly higher appropriation request of $777,090 (HB934_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-24-25_.PDF.txt) for FY26, justified by the office's current $360,000 (HB934_HD1_TESTIMONY_FIN_02-24-25_.PDF.txt) budget having essentially no operating expenses for two years.
